characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: An aspiring magician who Mr. Wright adopted when duty called.

characters.name: Jinxie Tenma
characters.description1: The maid of Kyubi Manor and a friend of Trucy. She thinks I'm a demon.

characters.name: The Amazing Nine-Tails
characters.description1: A masked wrestler of unknown identity and origin. The nine-tailed cape he sports is the signature piece of his costume.

characters.name: Damian Tenma
characters.description1: Jinxie's father and the mayor of Tenma Town. He was found unconscious at the scene of the crime.

characters.name: Rex Kyubi
characters.description1: The deceased alderman of Nine-Tails Vale. His snow-white hair was particularly striking.

characters.name: Athena Cykes
characters.description1: The latest lawyer to join our agency. She apparently studied psychology while she was in Europe!

characters.name: Phineas Filch
characters.description1: The caretaker of Kyubi Manor. He says he was guarding the entrance at the time of the murder.

characters.name: Bobby Fulbright
characters.description1: The detective investigating the murder in Nine-Tails Vale. He's a self-styled champion of justice and keeper of the peace.

characters.name: Florent L'Belle
characters.description1: Mayor Tenma's aide. He was supposedly in the foyer with Filch at the time of the murder.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: A brilliant former defense attorney who is supposed to be in retirement...

characters.name: Simon Blackquill
characters.description1: A prosecutor and prison inmate. He has mastered the use of psychological manipulation in courtroom battles.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: My cherished attorney's badge. Just putting it on makes me feel... ready.

evidences.name: Yokai Legend Scroll
evidences.description1: A scroll depicting the demon Tenma Taro and the Nine-Tailed Fox.
evidences.description2: The sole document showing what Tenma Taro looks like. It seems those who foolishly choose to depict the demon are cursed.

evidences.name: Tenma Taro Warding Charm
evidences.description1: The Tenma Taro warding charm that Jinxie gave me when I set out for the scene of the crime.

evidences.name: Nine-Tails Flower
evidences.description1: A flower found only in Nine-Tails Vale. It boosts Jinxie's courage because it was her mother's favorite.

evidences.name: Special Edition Paper
evidences.description1: A newspaper with a photo of Tenma Taro soaring through the air.

evidences.name: Crime Scene Diagram
evidences.description1: A diagram showing the scene of the crime.

evidences.name: Foyer Diagram
evidences.description1: A diagram of the foyer, including the office used by the caretaker, Phineas Filch.

evidences.name: Fox and Demon Statue
evidences.description1: A statue that was at the crime scene. It depicts Tenma Taro and the Nine-Tailed Fox locked in battle.
evidences.description2: The weapon used to bludgeon the mayor. The mayor's blood was found on it, but no fingerprints could be lifted.
evidences.description3: The weapon used to bludgeon the mayor. Wrapped in a large cloth. (2 pages.)
evidences.description4: A token of goodwill made in secret. Jinxie is now the only one who knows what the original looked like.

evidences.name: Golden Fur
evidences.description1: Some fur that was found at the scene of the crime. It's long and soft, and appears to be from some animal.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.description1: A photo of the Fox Chamber. There are bloody footprints and black feathers scattered on top of the blood.

evidences.name: Amazing Nine-Tails Mask
evidences.description1: A mask that washed up by the riverside. There's white hair inside.
evidences.description2: A mask found washed up by the riverside. It might have been at the crime scene. White hair inside.

evidences.name: Amazing Nine-Tails Glossy
evidences.description1: A photo of the hero who sparked the monster craze and saved Nine-Tails Vale from becoming a ghost town.

evidences.name: Jinxie's Statement
evidences.description1: Jinxie's eyewitness account of the demon in the hallway near the crime scene. She says it fled toward the foyer.

evidences.name: TV Listings
evidences.description1: Filch's TV program guide. The afternoon wrestling match was a total disaster.

evidences.name: Kyubi's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Cause of death: Stabbed with a spear. Est. time of death: Around 3:20 PM. The victim had been in a drug-induced slumber.

evidences.name: Blackmail Letter
evidences.description1: A threatening letter discovered in one of Alderman Kyubi's pockets.
evidences.description2: The threatening letter sent to the mayor. It's highly likely that it was L'Belle who took it from the mayor's briefcase.

evidences.name: Village Superstitions
evidences.description1: Superstitions that have been handed down generation to generation in Nine-Tails Vale.

evidences.name: Forbidden Chamber Key
evidences.description1: The key that the mayor took from the killer and swallowed. No fingerprints could be lifted from it.
evidences.description2: The key that the mayor took from the killer and swallowed. There's only one of its kind.

evidences.name: Couleur Me L'Belle!
evidences.description1: Hair color that washes out with water. It's Florent L'Belle's own brand and isn't available to the general public.

evidences.name: Hand Cream
evidences.description1: An item that was dropped in the Forbidden Chamber. It bears the "Je suis L'Belle" logo.

evidences.name: Forbidden Chamber Figure → Azuki Kozo Figure
evidences.description1: A figure that had been left inside the Tenma Taro statue. A thick layer of dust and dirt suggests it had been there for some time.
evidences.description2: A figure discovered inside the Tenma Taro statue. Apparently, it's something a certain thief leaves at the scene of a theft.
